mapper.select: select orderdate, orderseq, pdnum, pdnm, opt, amount, price, ordertakeout, complete_yn from orderinfo
mapper.insert: insert into orderinfo (orderdate, orderseq, pdnum, pdnm, opt, amount, price, ordertakeout, complete_yn) values (#{orderdate}, #{orderseq}, #{pdnum}, #{pdnm}, #{opt}, #{amount}, #{price}, #{ordertakeout}, #{complete_yn})
